channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【We shipped FinalizationRegistry in Workers: why you should never use it】我们在工人中运送了最终确认：为什么您永远不应该使用它
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Workers now support FinalizationRegistry, but just because you can use it doesn’t mean you should. 】CloudFlare工人现在支持最终确定措施，但仅仅因为您可以使用它并不意味着您应该使用。

item.title: 【Celebrating 11 years of Project Galileo’s global impact】庆祝伽利略项目的全球影响11周年
item.description: 【 June 2025 marks the 11th anniversary of Project Galileo, Cloudflare’s effort to protect vulnerable public interest organizations from cyber threats. 】2025年6月是Cloulflare项目伽利略项目11周年纪念日，为保护脆弱的公共利益组织免受网络威胁而努力。

item.title: 【Orange Me2eets: We made an end-to-end encrypted video calling app and it was easy】橙色ME2Eets：我们制作了一个端到端的加密视频通话应用程序，这很容易
item.description: 【 Orange Meets, our open-source video calling web application, now supports end-to-end encryption using the MLS protocol with continuous group key agreement. 】Orange Meets是我们的开源视频调用Web应用程序，现在使用MLS协议和连续的组密钥协议支持端到端加密。

item.title: 【Containers are available in public beta for simple, global, and programmable compute】公共Beta中有容器可用于简单，全局和可编程的计算
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Containers are now available in public beta. Deploy simple, global, and programmable containers alongside your Workers. 】CloudFlare容器现在可以在公共Beta中使用。与工人一起部署简单，全球和可编程的容器。

item.title: 【Everything you need to know about NIST’s new guidance in “SP 1800-35: Implementing a Zero Trust Architecture”】您需要了解的有关NIST在“ SP 1800-35：实施零信任体系结构”的新指南中需要了解的一切
item.description: 【 We read NIST’s new guidance on “Implementing a Zero-Trust Architecture” so that you don’t have to. Read this to get the key points on the newly-released NIST Special Publication 1800-35. 】我们阅读了NIST关于“实施零值体系结构”的新指南，因此您不必这样做。 请阅读此内容以获取新发行的NIST特别出版物1800-35的关键点。

item.title: 【Connect any React application to an MCP server in three lines of code】将任何React应用程序连接到MCP服务器中的三行代码
item.description: 【 We're open-sourcing use-mcp, a React library that connects to any MCP server in just 3 lines of code, as well as our AI Playground, a complete chat interface that can connect to remote MCP servers. 】我们是开放式用户使用MCP，这是一个仅在3行代码中连接到任何MCP服务器的React库以及我们的AI Playground，这是一个可以连接到远程MCP服务器的完整聊天界面。

item.title: 【Cloudflare Log Explorer is now GA, providing native observability and forensics】CloudFlare Log Explorer现在为GA，提供本地可观察性和取证能力
item.description: 【 We are happy to announce the General Availability of Cloudflare Log Explorer, a powerful product designed to bring observability and forensics capabilities directly into your Cloudflare dashboard. 】我们很高兴宣布CloudFlare Log Explorer的一般可用性，这是一种强大的产品，旨在将可观察性和取证功能直接带入您的Cloudflare仪表板中。

item.title: 【Cloudflare service outage June 12, 2025】CloudFlare服务停电2025年6月12日
item.description: 【 Multiple Cloudflare services, including Workers KV, Access, WARP and the Cloudflare dashboard, experienced an outage for up to 2 hours and 28 minutes on June 12, 2025. 】包括工人KV，Access，Warp和Cloudflare仪表板在内的多个CloudFlare服务在2025年6月12日的停电中最多28分钟经历了停电。

item.title: 【Defending the Internet: how Cloudflare blocked a monumental 7.3 Tbps DDoS attack】捍卫互联网：CloudFlare如何阻止纪念性7.3 TBPS DDOS攻击
item.description: 【 In mid-May 2025, Cloudflare blocked the largest DDoS attack ever recorded: a staggering 7.3 terabits per second (Tbps). 】在2025年3月中旬，Cloudflare封锁了有史以来最大的DDOS攻击：每秒惊人的7.3 Terabits（TBPS）。

item.title: 【Building agents with OpenAI and Cloudflare’s Agents SDK】与OpenAI和Cloudflare代理SDK建造代理商
item.description: 【 We’re building AI agents where logic and reasoning are handled by OpenAI’s Agents SDK, and execution happens across Cloudflare's global network via Cloudflare’s Agents SDK. 】我们正在建立AI代理，在该代理商中，OpenAI代理SDK处理逻辑和推理，并且通过CloudFlare的代理SDK在Cloudflare的全球网络中进行了执行。
